title: League causing computer to crash, someone help ;-;
body:
How to recreate:
1. start league
2. join game
3. game starts
4. computer crash

Now I'm just guessing but I am willing to bet this is something on my pc. Any information needed to help will be happily provided once I know what it is exactly ha.

replies.body: As an added note I am soooooooooooooooooooooo sorry to the guys who had to deal with me being unable to get into the game if you see this I'm sorry ;-;
